description: James Castle and Drae Axtell are getting ready for their gay sex Halloween party during their vacation together in Spain. Drae is going as a vampire and James is going as Frankenstein, and they are both taking the opportunity to show off their beautiful muscular bodies. As they are on their way out the door, Sean Xavier appears to show off his own costume – a giant unicorn mask. Everyone decides to skip the party to instead share Sean Xavier’s giant black cock. What are they going to do with it? Take all nine inches of it bareback!
title: Drae Axtell, James Castle, Sean Xavier | Bareback Halloween
